comment:
“Thanks.” You complete the transaction and equip the items, enjoying a lot more ongoing effects. Your new armor forms a nice black-and-gold ensemble, silver below the waist; you pull the hood of your cloak over your head, and store your old pants and boots in your UI.

“Remember my words, Keeper.” It says. “Or, move on. It matters not to me—but my work might be integral to your success.”

> [[ You have 129 credits. ]]

> [[ UI Messenger – Crimson Guardian Liza ]]
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Congratulations on your success.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: I'm sure everything went admirably.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Though Kainzo's told me he's... disappointed with your performance. Should I be concerned?

> Ayla, Vision, Donnel, Vyx, and Liza are all online.
> Smith, Nel, Tatsumaki, and Aelriss are offline.

[[ 1 ]]
> Respond to Liza. (Write-in.)
> Ignore Liza or send someone else a message. (Write-in.)

[[ 2 ]]
> Chat with the Forgemaster.
> Sell other items. (Write-in.)
> Exit the Aetherforge.
name: Sylvetica
